mapper.select: SELECT A.RN, A.PROD_NO, A.PROD_NAME, A.PRICE, A.DISCOUNT, A.PROD_CONTENT, A.ORIGIN, A.STOCK, A.FILESYSTEM, A.PROD_CATEGORY_NAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PROD_NO DESC) AS RN, P.PROD_NO, P.PROD_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT, P.PROD_CONTENT, P.ORIGIN, P.STOCK, P.FILESYSTEM, C.PROD_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN PROD_CATEGORY C ON P.PROD_CATEGORY_NO = C.PROD_CATEGORY_NO) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT P.PROD_NO, P.PROD_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT, P.PROD_CONTENT, P.ORIGIN, P.STOCK, P.FILESYSTEM, C.PROD_CATEGORY_NAME, P.PATH, P.PROD_THUMBNAIL FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN PROD_CATEGORY C ON P.PROD_CATEGORY_NO = C.PROD_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PROD_NO = #{prodNo}

SELECT P.PROD_NO, P.PROD_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT, P.PROD_CONTENT, P.ORIGIN, P.STOCK, P.FILESYSTEM, C.PROD_CATEGORY_NAME, P.PATH, P.PROD_THUMBNAIL FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN PROD_CATEGORY C ON P.PROD_CATEGORY_NO = C.PROD_CATEGORY_NO WHERE PROD_NO = #{prodNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROD_DETAIL_IMAGE (PROD_DETAIL_IMAGE_NO, PROD_NO, FILESYSTEM) VALUES (PROD_DETAIL_IMAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{prodNo}, #{filesystem})

SELECT PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PROD_NO, PROD_CATEGORY_NO, PROD_NAME, PRICE, DISCOUNT, PROD_CONTENT, ORIGIN, STOCK, FILESYSTEM, PATH, PROD_THUMBNAIL) VALUES (#{prodNo}, #{prodCategoryNo}, #{prodName}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{prodContent}, #{origin}, #{stock}, #{filesystem}, #{path}, #{prodThumbnail})
